entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the one who is dying. He is described as rolling on to his side and drawing great, rattling breaths that sounded agonising.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is trying to help Dumbledore by casting Aguamenti spell.

entities.name: goblet
entities.description: The goblet is the object that Harry uses to try and give water to Dumbledore.

relationships.description: Harry tries to help Dumbledore by casting Aguamenti spell.
Harry uses the goblet to try and give water to Dumbledore.
